jobDescription: Effective complaint management and ensuring RT / TAT is achieved as per the objectives. To ensure preventive maintenance is rendered effectively and timely. Regular visit to customer and audits of site conditions and work done. Interact and coordinate with channel partners for day-to-day call management. Dealer infrastructure evaluation and time-bound corrective actions based on it. Forecasting of spares and float stock planning at dealer's end. Validation of job completed & reports. Evaluate dealer performance & initiate corrective actions. Coordinate for Warranty claims filing and return of defectives. Identify and impart first-level training to technicians. Regular feedback on field failures and analysis. Conduct audit for quality of installation / PMS / BDS / safety / parts claims on a regular basis. Ensure safe work atmosphere. Timely feedback and MIS submission.
location: Will be informed later (in city only)

ctc.variablePay: Variable Pay as per Division will be applicable. (Salary will increase depending on market conditions next year)

jobDescription: Movidu is an innovative company that works with both B2B and B2C sectors. In the B2B side, Movidu creates tech products for small-scale companies. In the B2C area, Movidu acts as an aggregator, connecting companies with recent graduates and providing opportunities like live projects and industrial workshops.

Proficiency in Python programming and familiarity with Computer vision libraries. Understanding of ML models and exposure to common ML libraries from basic NumPy and Scikit Learn to Keras and TensorFlow. The intern will work in the field of photogrammetry, focusing on Structure from Motion (SFM) to create 3D visual models from multiple images. Responsibilities include recognizing components from their physical dimensions, detecting faults in 3D objects using computer vision and ML techniques, and generating an inventory of components.
dateOfJoining: 2 months (onsite), extendable to 4-6 months hybrid based on project

jobDescription: Cummins Group in India is a leading provider of integrated power solutions for the industrial and automotive sectors. It operates through twelve companies. Established in 1962 and headquartered in Pune, Cummins India Limited (CIL) is the oldest and largest entity within the group and is one of the leading power solutions providers in the country. Cummins India is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment, being an equal opportunity employer.
